        public void registerAction(UndoRedoAction undoRedoAction,

        Register an undo/redo action
        Parameters:
        undoRedoAction - Action to register
        doIt - Choose do action in same time

      • removeSpecificUndoRedo

        public void removeSpecificUndoRedo(int indexUndoRedo)
        Undo all action (since read index), remove the specified undo/redo action, redo all action (since read index).
        The undo all and redo all are not done if the index is after the read index.
        If the index is before the read index, read index is decremented after the call
        Parameters:
        indexUndoRedo - Index of remove undo/redo action

      • undo

        public void undo()
        Undo the last action
